analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/41/0xd6b87427bc00bdebd4c31d922b238b3f7b8a1334.sol:
	Contract SCPS1Token has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/41/0xd6b87427bc00bdebd4c31d922b238b3f7b8a1334.sol#209)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/41/0xd6b87427bc00bdebd4c31d922b238b3f7b8a1334.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/41/0xd6b87427bc00bdebd4c31d922b238b3f7b8a1334.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/41/0xd6b87427bc00bdebd4c31d922b238b3f7b8a1334.sol#79) is not in mixedCase
